release_note: Bug fixes and improvements
Support for rich text in Otter Chat Performance improvements
Fixes a bug that prevented adding comments to a conversation transcript

Bug fixes and improvements
Bug fixes and improvements
Live conversations are now displayed on a dedicated card on the Home screen and it s easier to see your next upcoming meeting Stability improvements
Added support for live summaries for live meetings. Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Minor tweaks to the new Home screen design

Bug fixes and improvements
Bug fixes and improvements
Bug fixes and improvements
You can new request access to a conversation if someone sends you a link but the owner hasn t shared with you You can also see and grant or deny these requests as a conversation owner
Web urls phone numbers and addresses in your conversations text notes will now appear as links You can now invite others to join your workspace Accessibility improvements for VoiceOver users
Web urls phone numbers and addresses in your conversations text notes will now appear as links You can now invite others to join your workspace Accessibility improvements for VoiceOver users
Groups are now called Channels Keep an eye on recent activity with the Notifications screen Invite other people to your Workspace
Copy your meeting summary to the clipboard in a single tap
Speaker names are now shown in real time during live recordings of Zoom calls Meeting summaries contain two levels of detail: tap a section to see finer details
Bug fixes and improvements

New options added to Meeting settings: control automatic screenshots captured by your Otter Assistant as well as email notifications sent before your Otter Assistant joins a call Conversation transcripts are now accessible for use with features like VoiceOver
Bug fixes and improvements
Otter will display a warning message while recording a conversation if there is a problem with your audio or upload
When a paragraph of conversation is followed by multiple photos they will be arranged horizontally instead of vertically
Fixes some UI issues seen when using the floating keyboard on iPad
Bug fixes and improvements
Improved display of your day s agenda at the top of the Home Screen

Improvements to the Skip silence feature: now even more efficient at skipping silence while playing back conversation audio Otter Pro Business only Fixes a bug affecting some users who would always be taken to My Agenda when launching Otter
Bug fixes and improvements
Bug fixes and improvements
Easily add screenshots from your meetings being recorded by an Otter Assistant
Basic and Pro users can now see any workspaces that are available to join in the navigation panel Fixes a crash affecting some users
Bug fixes and improvements
Bug fixes and improvements
Better reliability when uploading audio files Improved app stability
Fixes a brief screen freeze that happened occasionally when opening a conversation Fixes the home screen badge number being set too high for some users
Text notes in your conversations can now be edited Adding photos from your gallery is now quicker and easier
Imported files will now show up in My Conversations sorted by when you imported them instead of by the file s creation date Bug fixes and improvements

We ve improved how you can share conversations Simpler permissions: choose between Collaborator or Viewer See more easily who you have shared with Share with a public link: make conversations visible to anyone with the link and revoke that access at any time Share with a link to anyone in your workspace Otter Business only
Quickly add photos to your conversation while recording or listening to a conversation by tapping the image button
Otter will now generate an outline of your meeting to help you easily remember what was discussed and jump to specific parts of the conversation! Otter for Business only
Back by popular demand: when viewing a live recording tap the expand button to see the transcript in full screen mode with extra large font sizes

Meet the New Otter. Everything teams need for productive collaborative meetings. Use the NEW Meeting Gems to capture key takeaways from your meetings Capture highlights Add free form text notes and comments Assign action items to others
Minor bug fixes and performance improvements
Minor bug fixes and performance improvements
This release fixes a rare crash that happened when the app started up
Finding a filter such as a specific group direct message or speaker for your conversation search results is now easier Pro and Business only
The navigation bar has been reorganized to make finding your content even easier: Groups have been split into Groups and DMs and they re sorted alphabetically now.

Join video calls directly from My Agenda! If you have connected your calendar s with Otter you ll see new buttons in My Agenda for joining Zoom Microsoft Teams Google Meet or Cisco Webex meeting URLs from your calendar events. You can now turn on off individual emails and push notifications in Settings Notifications.
Fixes a few crashes Improves recovery of your recorded audio in the event of a crash during recording
Fixes an error in loading conversations in a folder Minor changes to the layout of events in My Agenda
Updated layout for the My Agenda screen
Fixed a bug that prevented sharing a recording from the iOS Voice Memos app to Otter for transcription
For Otter Business only Otter Assistant can now join video calls on Microsoft Teams Google Meet and Cisco WebEx! Groups list will now load much faster especially if you have many groups.
Make collaborating easier by syncing your calendar and when you record Otter can help give your recording a title and easily choose whether to share with other event participants
For Otter Business subscribers only Otter Assistant can now join events synced from your local calendar Fixes a minor bug in transcript editing
For Otter Business subscribers only My Agenda now loads faster on startup and refreshes automatically.

Otter Assistant for Zoom is now available to Otter Business subscribers: Auto joins meetings to transcribe share notes Works even if you run late or can t make a meeting Schedule ahead and never forget to take notes again
Conversations in groups are always in the same order when you open the Otter app on any supported platform.
Faster loading of Groups with many conversations More reliable recordings for low memory devices
Faster loading of folders with many conversations
Improved accuracy and capitalization
Control Otter with Siri Shortcuts and Back Tap! You can create Shortcuts to start and stop recording or add highlights and comments when recording or viewing a live conversation.
Long press on a conversation in your search results to enter selection mode and perform actions in bulk such as sharing moving to a folder exporting and deleting
Select or deselect all conversations on a page by tapping the double checkmark icon to perform bulk actions like share export move to folder or delete.

Long press on a conversation in any list to see a preview and a menu of options like share export or move to folder iOS 13 or higher Transcribe and caption Google Meet meetings in real time and save audio transcripts with the Otter.ai Chrome Extension
Transcribe and caption Google Meet in real time and save audio transcripts with the Otter.ai Chrome Extension.
Long press on a conversation in a list to quickly preview it and optionally perform an action like share or delete without having to navigate away from the list iOS 13 only

Tap on a speaker s talk time to toggle between percentage of the discussion vs time spent talking Pro and Business plans only Tap on an unnamed speaker in the speakers list to search for what they said and give them a name so Otter will recognize their voice next time!

Percentage Talk Time for each speaker in a conversation for gaining insights on: 1. Engagement: track levels of contribution to a meeting 2. Inclusion: ensure equal opportunity to speak 3. Conversation Intelligence: are you balancing speaking and listening Pro and Business plans only

Percentage Talk Time for each speaker in a conversation for gaining insights on: 1. Engagement: track levels of contribution to a meeting 2. Inclusion: ensure equal opportunity to speak 3. Conversation Intelligence: are you balancing speaking and listening Pro and Business plans only

Adds a highlight button to the conversation detail screen. When playing back audio tap it to highlight the sentence currently being spoken. When you tap on a notification or home screen card about a new comment in a conversation it will bring you to the comment itself
Keyboard will now automatically dismiss when you perform a search Otter Pro If you ve enabled Remove Otter branding in export the generated file name will not have otter added to it
Tapping on notifications about new comments or highlights will now open the conversation and scroll to that annotation
Advanced Search: add filters to your search queries to specify Speakers Groups Folders or Date Pro and Business plans only
Fixes a crash that occurred occasionally during recording
Otter Premium is now called Otter Pro and Otter for Teams is now called Otter for Business. You ll still get all the same great features! Fixes a crash that occurred rarely during recording

iOS 14: Otter has a newly redesigned widget that can go on your home screen Start a new recording with one tap See recording status without opening the app See upcoming events from connected calendars

Auto scroll improvements Tap the resume auto scroll arrow button to jump to the currently spoken words during playback or live transcription Fixes a bug where the full screen live transcript may stop auto scrolling after rotating your iPad
Imports .mp4 .aac .flac .m4v .wma and .wmv video file formats Fixes minor issues with tapping on words in a conversation and creating shareable links
Fixes the ability to import more than one file at a time Premium only Fixes a couple bugs that would occasionally make it difficult to tag speakers in a conversation
Rename your speakers by tapping the three dot button next to their name

To everyone who s been using Otter for a long time now thank you! We ve included a couple features to make your lives easier: If you have a long groups list Otter will hide the groups that don t have any recent activity. You can always access the full list by tapping Show more. Conversations that you recorded before this year will include a year in their date for better clarity when scrolling through a list of conversations or search results.
Check out the new and improved Help Center in Settings FAQ to browse help articles and search for answers to your questions about Otter.
Fixes an bug that occasionally blocked scrolling to your search results
New 1.75x playback speed for Premium Teams plans

Export the text of a live conversation without having to wait until the end of a long meeting. Tap the export icon at the upper right corner. Streaming link to Otter Live Notes for Zoom will now open the Otter app so you can view and highlight the live transcription more easily.
Enlarge text for live conversations you record or ones shared with you. Tap the double arrow icon at the upper right corner.

Record transcribe and take live notes on podcasts or videos playing in iOS Podcasts Pandora Spotify SoundCloud YouTube and other apps. Otter will no longer pause recordings automatically when some apps play audio but for best quality minimizing all other sounds is recommended.
Fixes the Manage Subscription option in Settings if you ve subscribed to Premium through the App Store Fixes a bug with loading some public group URLs
Fixes a few crashes that could happen when uploading a conversation or connecting a calendar
Otter Live Notes is an add on for Zoom meeting hosts to enable live transcription for all participants and live note taking for collaborators. Available with the Otter for Teams plan.
In Settings you can now permanently delete your account and all associated data.

Live Video Meeting Notes a new feature in the Otter for Teams plan enables Zoom meeting hosts to provide live transcription and collaborative note taking to all participants making remote work learning more accessible and productive. Basic Plan still offers free recording and Zoom syncing up to 600 minutes per month but now limits each transcription to 40 minutes. Importing is now exclusive to Otter Premium and Teams plans and we offer Basic Plan users 3 trial imports. Upgrade to Otter Premium to transcribe any number of imports Otter recordings and synced Zoom recordings up to 4 hours per transcription and 6000 minutes per month.
Font size based on adjustable Text Size in iOS Settings Dynamic Type Accessibility improvements Fixed a rare crash that happened when viewing conversations
Font size based on adjustable Text Size in iOS Settings Dynamic Type Accessibility improvements Fixed a rare crash that happened when viewing conversations
You can now add a personalized message when sharing a conversation by invite. Fixes a bug that prevented live transcripts from automatically scrolling.
You can now see the upload progress and cancel the upload if it s taking too long when sharing audio and video files from other apps into Otter.
You can now see the upload progress and cancel the upload if it s taking too long when sharing audio and video files from other apps into Otter.
Fixes an issue that could result in slow uploads in particular with an unstable data connection
Fixes an error that could happen when signing in with Apple on more than one device
Sign in with Apple! Fix for a crash when playing audio on the Highlights Summary screen Improved layout and performance for iOS 11 and below
Custom Vocabulary: boost the accuracy of proper names jargon acronyms unique name spellings etc. Enter up to 5 words with the Basic plan 200 words and 200 names with the Premium and Teams plans

Live Share: if you have connected Otter to a calendar in Settings there is a new option to remind you to share your live conversation to all calendar invitees in one tap Live collaboration: highlight comment and add photos to a conversation shared with you in real time Fixed an issue where the Link Sharing option is covered up when sharing a conversation
Fixes a crash occurring on devices running iOS 12 and below when toggling Otter s Dark Mode setting
Addresses a crash that occurs on some jailbroken devices
You re not seeing double. We fixed a bug that may sometimes show the same photo twice in a conversation.

NEW FEATURE: You can add Comments to annotate your conversations with notes and URL links and message other collaborators by typing followed by their names. Learn more: https: blog.otter.ai comments Smoother experience when selecting text in the live conversation during recording Otter for Teams only you can now add custom vocabulary for both personal and team levels Otter for Teams only fixed an issue with phone number entry during two factor authentication setup
Updated color scheme for improved readability and WCAG compliance
Minor UI improvements
Fixes the export flow not showing up on some iPads Better performance on older devices

Rate transcript quality at the bottom of each conversation to give us more targeted feedback Long swipe to clear an activity card in Home Faster background upload of any recordings made when your device was offline iOS 13 only Tap on a notification to start recording again if the app stopped unexpectedly in the middle of a recording
Fixes a couple of issues that can cause certain devices to crash

Premium feature Export to Microsoft Word DOCX PDF and SRT formats Premium feature Option to show highlights in DOCX and PDF exports Premium feature Option to auto crop SRT captions with configurable number of lines and characters per line See photos added collaboratively in the live transcript Dark mode setting to allow overriding system default for iOS 13 VoiceOver support improvements

New features for iOS 13! Dark Mode: Otter will run in iOS 13 s Dark Mode if you enable it in the iOS Settings app. For iOS 12 and below you can still turn on Otter s own Dark Mode under Otter s Advanced Settings. Interactive Shortcuts: You can create a Siri Shortcut that starts an Otter recording asks you what title to give it which folder to save in and which group to share to all by voice!
More reliable uploading of audio in poor network conditions More robust and speedy loading of groups
Premium Teams feature You can now enter twice as many custom words phrases and unique name spellings in Settings Manage vocabulary Also check out Otter.ai web version.
Highlight Summary: tap on Highlights at the top of a conversation to view playback and export just the highlighted text. Use this feature for meeting summary interview quotes and research findings.
Premium Teams feature Sync video audio files from Dropbox in Settings Connect cloud storage iPad multitasking support
Fixes an issue with export on iPad
Improves the calendar connection card on the home screen lets you pick from Google Microsoft and local calendars also accessible in Settings Fixes stretched cover photos for public groups on iPad

New gestures for interacting with a conversation: Single tap to start playing at a word Double tap or long press to select a sentence Tutorial on the basic playback features accessible from Settings and automatically shown to new users Fix for export issue on iPad
New users will now be offered a tutorial on recording conversations with Otter. The tutorial can also be accessed by anyone in Settings.

When recording you will now see a pop up alert if there is no audio input for more than 30 seconds A misleading Uploading from your other device status message will no longer be shown when conversations were actually done uploading

Limit the visible range of a conversation shared via a public link under Share outside Otter check the Set playback range checkbox and adjust the start and end points Folders are now sorted alphabetically
Fixes an uncommon crash while recording or editing conversations

Share a link to a Snippet of your conversation by selecting some text and choosing Share Easily move items in My Conversations or Folders to another Folder of your choice by selecting them and choosing Move to Folder from the three dot menu
Adds a Start playback on word tap setting to the playback options menu in the lower left when viewing a conversation
Allows multi selection of phrases in your Custom Vocabulary for easier management Otter Premium only
Custom vocabulary is now available to Otter Premium! Go to Manage vocabulary in Settings and enter words phrases and names of people you wish to teach Otter to recognize better.

Referral program is here! Check out the Home screen to see a card that will show you the rewards you can get by referring friends to sign up for Otter! Improves the speaker identification experience by identifying parts of your conversations from the same unknown speaker as Speaker 1 Speaker 2 etc. Pull down to refresh a folder

You can now multi select conversations in a folder to bulk delete them or remove them from the folder back to My Conversations. Premium Plan You can also multi select conversations in a folder to bulk export the audio text.

Deleting conversations will now move them to your Trash. Conversations in your trash can be restored but conversations that have been in the Trash for 30 days will automatically be deleted. Your groups are now divided into read and unread sections for easier navigation Minor bug fixes to dark mode
Fixes an infrequent crash that could happen during recording
You and your collaborators can highlight sentences with one tap while recording
Fixes a bug affecting login with Microsoft Fixes a crash for iPad users

Instead of tabs switch between conversations groups settings and more using a navigation drawer Organize the conversations you ve recorded by putting them into folders Highlight important parts of transcripts so everyone can see Log in using Microsoft
Fixes a crash that occurred when viewing a small number of conversations
Fixes a bug where the Face ID security feature could get stuck Fixes a crash that occasionally happened when editing transcript text
Premium users only Option to exclude Otter branding in exported text under Settings Advanced Settings
Export as SRT subtitle format

You can disable pop up reminders to share your conversations with meeting participants in Settings Connect Calendars When exporting multiple conversations Otter Premium only the order of the exported conversations will be the same as your selections.
Adds a Dark Mode option to Settings Advanced Settings
Fixes a rare failure in uploading
Opening a link to an Otter conversation or public group will now open in the Otter app
Ask for Push Notification permission less frequently
Import multiple files at once! Fix for an occasional crash issue during recording
Import multiple files at once!

Conversations titled Note in the list view now also show top keywords to tell them apart Improved scrolling of transcript in the live conversation view Correct orientation when displaying landscape photos inline with the transcript

New Siri Shortcut to start recording a recurring meeting and share the real time transcript simultaneously in one command iOS 12 only Option to export transcript as a monologue without line breaks speakers or timestamps Faster upload of audio recorded offline Localized date time
Prevents the app from getting killed while recording with Otter in the background or with the screen off Reduces battery drain during recording
Jump to things that were said by a specific person by tapping their name in the conversation info header Fixes several crashes and bugs

iOS 12 support Siri Shortcuts to start stop recording with your voice! Add your custom phrases in iOS Settings Otter Siri Search Shortcuts. Toggle between showing all conversations or just the ones you ve recorded imported in the Conversations tab Tap the Conversations tab icon repeatedly to scroll to the next unread conversation Faster load time when opening a conversation Fix a bug related to the one tap recording control in Otter s iOS Widget

Live cast the transcription and photos of your meeting conversation in real time by sharing at the start of recording Visualize a conversation or group of conversations as a Word Cloud and search by tapping on the words in the cloud Undo your edits to the transcript in case you made a mistake

Live cast the transcription and photos of your meeting conversation in real time by sharing at the start of recording Visualize a conversation or group of conversations as a Word Cloud and search by tapping on the words in the cloud Undo your edits to the transcript in case you made a mistake
Play audio while editing transcript Visualize audio volume while recording so you can tell if the microphone is too far from the speaking parties

New capabilities to make editing much easier! Edit the entire conversation at once instead of editing and saving one paragraph at a time Editable paragraph breaks! Hit backspace to merge with a previous paragraph hit return to split into a new one. Import video mp4 avi mov wmv mpg from iOS Files More ways to add conversations to a group hit the blue icon in a group select Add to Group in the 3 dot menu of a conversation Otter Premium Skip silence between paragraphs option in the playback speed selector
Print as PDF via AirPrint Connect Otter to your Google calendar or contacts separately in Connect calendars or Import contacts under Settings Export options are also available in the Share screen
PDF export iOS widget with one tap recording controls Recent Searches are remembered when you log in again Dashboard is now called Home

Remember your last selected speed in subsequent conversation playbacks Premium feature 0.75x 1.25x 1.5x 3x playback speeds Bulk unshare your conversations from groups Export options also available below the 3D Touch Peek view Simpler default message when sharing public view only links Faster onboarding and voiceprint creation

Bulk export your conversations audio Premium only Bulk unshare your conversations from a group Record via AirPods Dynamic Type support to adjust the conversation text to your preferred font size iOS 11 or higher More intuitive experience for sharing a conversation Fixes occasional logout bug and Google sign in crash

Bulk export your conversations audio Premium only Bulk unshare your conversations from a group Record via AirPods Dynamic Type support to adjust the conversation text to your preferred font size iOS 11 or higher More intuitive experience for sharing a conversation Fixes occasional logout bug
Fixes some users inability to delete or share conversations

Export photos to iOS Photos and other apps Need a quicker way to share export or delete multiple conversations at once Tap on the gray icon on the left to multi select for bulk actions not applicable to conversations shared with you . Share notes with meeting participants easily with their emails pre filled for you Enhanced UI in Conversations Groups and Recording screens
Rotation support for iPad Swipe to share conversations directly from the list DWX18 public group for attendees of the Digital Workplace Experience conference to access recordings and transcripts

Calendar sync enhancements: connect individual iOS calendars do not sync all day events Inline Photos enhancement: add photos to conversation bubbles swipe up to dismiss full screen mode Export audio Copy public link to Clipboard Accessibility improvements
Import audio from local storage and iCloud Swipe between conversations without going back to the list

New features enhancements: Export text with new options to select some or all segments share as plain text or file attachment merge same speaker segments and add your own comments Limit which calendar events you wish to be reminded to record by choosing a list of keywords in Settings Notifications Peek and pop with 3D Touch to view and listen to conversations in a list Face ID Touch ID lock option for extra privacy protection Bug fixes improvements: More reliable import of a large number of contacts More accurate indication of audio upload status Improved notifications and recovery from recording interruptions by phone calls

Sync events from iOS Calendar to receive reminder notifications to record and title the conversations automatically Exported text can now optionally include speaker names and timestamps Adjustable playback speed is now directly on the audio control itself Save inline photos to iOS Photos View inline photos in landscape mode Swipe to delete or leave a group Stop recording automatically after 3 hours to avoid wasted minutes

Sync photos taken from Camera app to Otter as inline photos Zoom in out inline photos Photo thumbnails as shortcuts to jump into conversations Swipe to delete or unshare your group conversations Pull down to refresh conversation detail

A new premium plan that includes 6 000 minutes of transcription time per month 10 times more than the free plan. Inline Photos: You can snap photos of a whiteboard a presenter or other relevant content when recording and Otter will add them inline as part of your notes.
Record audio over bluetooth Bug fixes and improvements
